Russia: With the approval of most of the local nobility, Vasili arrived in the Pskov Republic and declared it dissolved.
Cuba: Spanish set out from Hispaniola. The conquest of Cuba begins.
Colombia: Spanish conquerors discover San Andres y Providencia islands
China: Prince of Anhua rebellion: Ming tax collectors were murdered on the orders of Zhu Zhifan, the prince of Anhua in modern Shaanxi.
